Drawing Instructions

You are going to help James check his schedule for errors by drawing a graph of his patient scheduling data.

The experimenter has provided you with a pencil and sheet of graph paper. Using these materials, please draw a triangular interval graph. The triangular interval graph is one of the graphs you used in the previous activities (the one with the diagonal grid lines). Please plots each of the appointments listed on the data table on the graph.


When you are finished, please check that you have:

    Write on the "Code" line

    Write your session on the "Session" line

    Put a title on your graph

    Put a title on each of the axes

    Labelled the tick marks on the axes

    Labelled each data point (as needed)
